2812.name: BANNED_DEVICE_ALL
2812.message:
Online services are unavailable
on this console.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2812.short_description: Your console is permanently banned from all aspects of the network.
2812.long_description:
Your console has been permanently banned from all aspects of the network. This includes, but is not limited to:

- Miiverse
- Game servers
- 3rd party services which opt-in to respecting network bans.
2812.short_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
